text: Leonard T. Connors, Jr. (April 11, 1929 â€“ December 4, 2016) was an American politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. Connors was born in Jersey City, New Jersey. He served in the New Jersey State Senate from 1982 to 2008. He represented the 9th Legislative District. Previously he served on the Ocean County Board of Chosen Freeholders from 1977 to 1982, and was the Mayor of Surf City, New Jersey from 1966 to 2015.Len Connors proud of half-century legacy as Surf City mayor, The Press of Atlantic City, January 6, 2016. Connors died on December 4, 2016, at the age of 87 at his home in Seacrest nursing home.Miller, Patricia A. "Veteran Legislator, Longtime Surf City Mayor Leonard T. Connors Dies At 87", Brick Patch, December 5, 2016. Accessed December 5, 2016. "Len Connors, who survived the Great Atlantic Storm of 1962 and Superstorm Sandy, died at home last night at 87, surrounded by his family, according to a statement from his son, current 9th District state Senator Christopher J. Connors Jr." == References == Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Jersey City, New Jersey
title: Leonard T. Connors
